CustomField.formula: IF ( CONTAINS(TEXT(Payment_Plans__c) , "48"), if (ISPICKVAL(Number_of_Births__c, "Single"), CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 1, 26.10, 2,44.04, 3,62.39, 0), if (ISPICKVAL(Number_of_Births__c, "Twins"), CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 2,52.20, 3,70.14, 4,88.08, 5,106.43, 6,124.78, 0), if (ISPICKVAL(Number_of_Births__c, "Triplets"), CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 3,78.30, 6,132.12, 9,187.17, 0), 0))), if (ISPICKVAL(Number_of_Births__c, "Single"), CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 1,19.21, 2,30.08, 3,41.79, 0), if (ISPICKVAL(Number_of_Births__c, "Twins"), CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 2,38.42, 3,49.29, 4,60.16, 5,71.87, 6,83.58, 0), if (ISPICKVAL(Number_of_Births__c, "Triplets"), CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 3,57.63, 6,90.24, 9,125.37, 0), 0))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Based on the number of products ordered.
CustomField.label: Monthly Fee hidden OLD
